thread.title: One Person Injured In Van Nuys Deputy-Involved Shooting
thread.title_full: One Person Injured In Van Nuys Deputy-Involved Shooting

title: One Person Injured In Van Nuys Deputy-Involved Shooting
text:
One Person Injured In Van Nuys Deputy-Involved Shooting February 13, 2017 5:05 PM Filed Under: Deputy Involved Shooting , Van Nuys Los Angeles County Sheriff's deputies at the scene of a deputy-involved shooting in Van Nuys. Feb. 13, 2017. 
VAN NUYS (CBSLA.com) – A person was shot and injured by Los Angeles County Sheriff’s deputies Monday afternoon in Van Nuys. 
The shooting occurred before 3:15 p.m. at Van Nuys Boulevard and Valerio Street, according to the sheriff’s department. The circumstances of the shooting and the condition of the victim was not confirmed. No deputies were hurt. 
Van Nuys was shut down between Sherman Way and Saticoy Street. 
Stay with CBSLA.com for the latest on this developing story.
